title: What are some songs to listen to if you're in absolute mental and psychological pain? - Quora

response.answer_text: You listen to this and the mental re-adjust to reality and psychologically gets you to feel more positive:

1- No Regrets by KSHMR ( May go wrong for you) 2- Don't let it break your heart by Louis Tomlinson 3 - Ignite by Alan Walker and K391 4 - Fix you by Coldplay Thats all I remember for now Try these and tell me the results 👍
